attributes.action: Give a genuine young man a visa to uk to be with his family.
attributes.additional_details: We are married in Muslim culture in his country, supported by his family & friends. Now we want to be with each other looking after our child seeing her grow up together. And be able to settle down get married by law & have more children. Please help in anyway
attributes.background: Last year he applied for family visitor visa, we supported the application with every piece of evidence & he was refused. We are happy genuine couple met 2009 and starting to build our family. We want to be together and be happy & give our daughter a good life

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling on the Government or Parliament to make a specific change to the rules on family visitor visas.
